author: rovere
body:
This will bring in DQMGUI 9.0.1 which has quite a number of important features:
   * The handling of the streamerInfo from ROOT has been completely rewritten with the goal to avoid in future the schema evolution problems we had in the past, that forces us to patch the index once per year.
   * Introduce ROOTJS so that the user can dynamically interact with the plots directly in the browser.
title: DQMGUI 9.0.1
